component.name: Card Grid
component.description: A flexible card grid component for displaying collections of items in a responsive grid layout. Supports various card sizes, dynamic column adjustment based on screen size, and hover interactions for improved user engagement.

variants.name: Bootstrap 5
variants.description: A clean card grid implementation featuring responsive layout, consistent spacing, intuitive card interactions, and smooth hover effects. Effectively organizes multiple items while maintaining visual hierarchy and usability across different device sizes and screen resolutions.
